название: Neem and Turmeric powder in veg capsules. Combo pack. 100 capsules each. For daily detox.
описание: Product DetailsWhy Isha Life's Neem & Turmeric Veg. Capsules?  Purifies and cleanses your system Can heal cold and flu related symptoms May boost your energy levels Beneficial for daily sadhana Also Read: Remarkable Benefits of Neem & TurmericWhat's in it?Each capsule contains 400 mg of high-quality neem and 500 mg of turmeric powder.How to consume it?It is recommended to take 2 capsules each in the morning on an empty stomach with tepid, light honey water.
